Name: The Last Escape
About the game: The Last Escape is a 2D side-scrolling platform shooter with puzzle and exploration elements. You have been kidnapped by bandits and are demanding a ransom. You woke up in some kind of basement and decide to get out on your own. In your heart, in addition to fear, rage boils at all those who did this, so you take up arms and fight your way to the exit. The place where you are is like some old abandoned mansion, with a million corridors and doors. You have to find a way out of this labyrinth, destroying enemies along the way, finding keys, weapons and ammo. 15 levels 4 types of enemies with different weapons 3 weapons 4 types of keys and doors
